summary: Successfully implemented CoherentBundle structure with all 5 phases. Defined UnionBoxContent, MutuallyCoherent predicate, CoherentBundle structure, basic properties, and toBMCS conversion. All proofs complete (no sorries). The toBMCS conversion proves modal_forward via mutual coherence and modal_backward via contraposition with saturation. This provides complete infrastructure for axiom-free BMCS construction.

artifacts.summary: Extended with CoherentBundle structure, isSaturated predicate, toBMCS conversion (fully proven), and supporting lemmas
Detailed implementation summary with verification results and remaining work documentation

completion_data.completion_summary: Implemented CoherentBundle structure with toBMCS conversion fully proven. Defines UnionBoxContent, MutuallyCoherent predicate, and proves modal_forward/modal_backward for saturated bundles. No sorries - complete infrastructure for axiom-free BMCS construction.
roadmap_items: Define CoherentBundle structure for multi-family mutual coherence

next_steps: Implement saturation construction using Zorn's lemma or iteration to complete axiom-free BMCS path
